verses.verse: Afterward he <S%H3212>brought<s%> me to the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, even the <S%H8179>gate<s%> that <S%H6437>looketh<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>.

And <S%H3519><s%>, behold, the glory of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6921>east<s%>: and his <S%H6963>voice<s%> was like the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>; and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H215>shined<s%> with his <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

And it was according to the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H4758>vision<s%> which I <S%H7200>saw<s%>, even according to the <S%H4758>vision<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> when I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>; and the <S%H4759>visions<s%> were like the <S%H4758>vision<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar<s%>; and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon my <S%H6440>face<s%>.

And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%>.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> took me <S%H5375>up<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>; <S%H3519>and<s%>, behold, the glory of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And I <S%H8085>heard<s%> one <S%H1696>speaking<s%> unto me out of the <S%H1004>house<s%>; and a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> by <S%H681>me<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, this is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H3678>throne<s%>, and the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet<s%>, where I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>. And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall no more <S%H2930>defile<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, neither <S%H4428>they<s%>, nor their kings, by their <S%H2184>whoredom<s%>, and by the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of their <S%H4428>kings<s%> in their high <S%H1116>places<s%>;

in their <S%H5414>setting<s%> of their <S%H5592>threshold<s%> by my <S%H5592>threshold<s%>, and their <S%H4201>door-post<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> my <S%H4201>door-post<s%>, and there was but the <S%H7023>wall<s%> between me and <S%H2930>them<s%>; and they have defiled my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> by their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which they have <S%H6213>committed<s%>: wherefore I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them in mine <S%H639>anger<s%>.

Now let them put <S%H7368>away<s%> their <S%H2184>whoredom<s%>, and the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of their <S%H4428>kings<s%>, <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H7931>me<s%>; and I will dwell in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

Thou <S%H1121><s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5046>show<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they may be <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>; and let them <S%H4058>measure<s%> the <S%H8508>pattern<s%>.

And if they be <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of all that they have <S%H6213>done<s%>, make <S%H3045>known<s%> unto them the <S%H6699>form<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H8498>fashion<s%> <S%H4161>thereof<s%>, and the egresses <S%H4126>thereof<s%>, and the entrances <S%H6699>thereof<s%>, and all the forms <S%H2708>thereof<s%>, and all the ordinances <S%H6699>thereof<s%>, and all the forms <S%H8451>thereof<s%>, and all the laws <S%H3789>thereof<s%>; and write it in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>; that they may <S%H8104>keep<s%> the whole <S%H6699>form<s%> <S%H2708>thereof<s%>, and all the ordinances <S%H6213>thereof<s%>, and do them.

This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>: upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> the whole <S%H1366>limit<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%> shall be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>. <S%H8451>Behold<s%>, this is the law of the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And these are the <S%H4060>measures<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> by <S%H520>cubits<s%> (the <S%H520>cubit<s%> is a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%>): the <S%H2436>bottom<s%> shall be a <S%H520>cubit<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%>, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> thereof by the <S%H8193>edge<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2239>span<s%>; and this shall be the <S%H1354>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And from the <S%H2436>bottom<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%> to the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H5835>ledge<s%> shall be <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit<s%>; and from the <S%H6996>lesser<s%> <S%H5835>ledge<s%> to the <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H5835>ledge<s%> shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%>.
And the upper <S%H741>altar<s%> shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>; and from the <S%H741>altar<s%> hearth and <S%H4605>upward<s%> there shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7161>horns<s%>.

And the <S%H741>altar<s%> hearth shall be <S%H8147>twelve<s%> cubits <S%H753>long<s%> by <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>, <S%H7251>square<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> sides <S%H7253>thereof<s%>.

And the <S%H5835>ledge<s%> shall be <S%H702>fourteen<s%> cubits <S%H753>long<s%> by <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>sides<s%> <S%H1366>thereof<s%>; and the border <S%H5439>about<s%> it shall be <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%>; and the <S%H2436>bottom<s%> thereof shall be a <S%H520>cubit<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>; and the <S%H4609>steps<s%> thereof shall <S%H6437>look<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: These are the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H5927>it<s%>, to offer <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> <S%H2236>thereon<s%>, and to sprinkle blood <S%H1818>thereon<s%>.

Thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that are of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>, who are <S%H7138>near<s%> unto <S%H8334>me<s%>, to minister unto <S%H5002>me<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5414>thereof<s%>, and put it on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H702>it<s%>, and on the four <S%H6438>corners<s%> of the <S%H5835>ledge<s%>, and upon the <S%H1366>border<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>: thus shalt thou <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> it and make atonement for <S%H3722>it<s%>.

Thou shalt also <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>, and it shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the appointed <S%H4662>place<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>.

And on the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H8163>a<s%> <S%H5795>he-goat<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>; and they shall <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, as they did <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> it with the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>.

When thou hast made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H2398>cleansing<s%> <S%H7126>it<s%>, thou shalt offer a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>, and a <S%H352>ram<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H7126>bring<s%> them near <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H4417>salt<s%> upon <S%H5927>them<s%>, and they shall offer them up for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>prepare<s%> every <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin-offering<s%>: they shall also <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and a <S%H352>ram<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>, without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>.
Seven <S%H7651><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall they make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H3722>purify<s%> <S%H4390>it<s%>; so shall they consecrate it.

And when they have <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%>, it shall be that upon the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H1973>forward<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> your <S%H8002>burnt-offerings<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and your <S%H5930>peace-offerings<s%>; and I will <S%H7521>accept<s%> <S%H5002>you<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.
